did.unittitle: Thomas and John Cooper estate papers
did.abstract: This collection consists of photocopies of the will of Thomas Cooper, dated 1742, and photocopies of a letter of administration of the estate of John Cooper to executor Annanias Cooper, dated 1756. The Cooper family lived in Southampton, Long Island.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Mrs. William A. Robbins, 1953.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This small collection is housed in one folder and has no particular arrangement.

bioghist.head: Biographical note
bioghist.p: The Cooper family lived in Southampton, Long Island.

prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Thomas and John Cooper estate papers, 1977.358, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of photocopies of the will of Thomas Cooper, dated 1742, and photocopies of a letter of administration of the estate of John Cooper to executor Annanias Cooper, dated 1756.
